languages.text: "Раз даже Лорд-капитан отведал{mf||а} похлебки, может слизнеплесень теперь этот, как его, деликатес? Это, получается, мы тут как богачи пируем?"

"Since the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has eaten the soup, does that mean mouldslime is a... whatchacallit... delicacy now? Have we been feasting like upper-deckers all this time and not even known it?"
languages.original_text: "Раз даже Лорд-капитан отведал{mf||а} похлебки, может слизнеплесень теперь этот, как его, деликатес? Это, получается, мы тут как богачи пируем?"

languages.text: «Como {mf|el|la} mismísim{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán se ha comido la sopa, ¿es ahora el limoho una... delicia de esas? ¿Hemos estado comiendo como los señoritos de las cubiertas superiores todo este tiempo sin saberlo?».
languages.original_text: "Since the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has eaten the soup, does that mean mouldslime is a... whatchacallit... delicacy now? Have we been feasting like upper-deckers all this time and not even known it?"

traits.locale_text: «Como {mf|el|la} mismísim{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán se ha comido la sopa, ¿es ahora el limoho una... delicia de esas? ¿Hemos estado comiendo como los señoritos de las cubiertas superiores todo este tiempo sin saberlo?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン本人がスープを飲んだということは、スライムが…珍味になったということ？今までずっと知らず知らずのうちに、上層階級のようなごちそうを食べてきたということ？」
languages.original_text: "Since the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has eaten the soup, does that mean mouldslime is a... whatchacallit... delicacy now? Have we been feasting like upper-deckers all this time and not even known it?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン本人がスープを飲んだということは、スライムが…珍味になったということ？今までずっと知らず知らずのうちに、上層階級のようなごちそうを食べてきたということ？」

languages.text: “既然舰长大人亲自喝过这种汤，这是不是意味着这种掺了霉菌的汤是一种……那个词是怎么说的来着……美味佳肴？会不会我们的伙食和那些贵族的伙食其实是一样的，只是我们一直都不知道而已？”
languages.original_text: "Since the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has eaten the soup, does that mean mouldslime is a... whatchacallit... delicacy now? Have we been feasting like upper-deckers all this time and not even known it?"

traits.locale_text: “既然舰长大人亲自喝过这种汤，这是不是意味着这种掺了霉菌的汤是一种……那个词是怎么说的来着……美味佳肴？会不会我们的伙食和那些贵族的伙食其实是一样的，只是我们一直都不知道而已？”

languages.text: "Da der Lord Captain persönlich die Suppe gegessen hat, ist damit Schimmelschleim jetzt ... wie heißt das ... eine Delikatesse? Haben wir die ganzen Zeit wie die von den oberen Decks gespeist und es nicht mal gewusst?"
languages.original_text: "Since the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has eaten the soup, does that mean mouldslime is a... whatchacallit... delicacy now? Have we been feasting like upper-deckers all this time and not even known it?"

traits.locale_text: "Da der Lord Captain persönlich die Suppe gegessen hat, ist damit Schimmelschleim jetzt ... wie heißt das ... eine Delikatesse? Haben wir die ganzen Zeit wie die von den oberen Decks gespeist und es nicht mal gewusst?"

languages.text: « Puisque {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} en personne a mangé la soupe, est-ce que ça veut dire que la moisissure est un... comment qu'on dit déjà ? Ah oui, un mets de choix ? Si ça se trouve, on ripaille depuis tout ce temps comme l'élite des ponts supérieurs et on le sait même pas ! »
languages.original_text: "Since the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has eaten the soup, does that mean mouldslime is a... whatchacallit... delicacy now? Have we been feasting like upper-deckers all this time and not even known it?"

Ah oui, un mets de choix ? Si ça se trouve, on ripaille depuis tout ce temps comme l'élite des ponts supérieurs et on le sait même pas ! »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, çorbadan bizzat içtiğine göre küf balçığı artık... Ne derler ona... Lüks mü sayılıyor? Bunca zamandır üst güvertedekiler gibi besleniyorduk da biz mi bilmiyorduk?"
languages.original_text: "Since the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} has eaten the soup, does that mean mouldslime is a... whatchacallit... delicacy now? Have we been feasting like upper-deckers all this time and not even known it?"
